text: Kare wa itta. `Anata gata no omo no chobatsu to o ikari wa, sudeni anata gata ni kudatte iru. Anata gata to, anata gata no sosen ga meimei shita (guzo no)-mei ni tsuite, arra ga nani no ken'i o mo sadzuke rarenai mono ni tsuite, anata gata wa watashi to ronso suru no ka. Sorenara mate. Hontoni watashi mo, anata gata to tomoni matte iru monodearu
